Billboard Placement Problem
===========================

Test Case 1
-------------
locations: 6, 7, 12, 13, 14
revenues:  5, 6, 5, 3, 1
distance:  20
separation: 5

Opt Revenue: 10
Opt Placements: 6,12


Test Case 2
-------------------
locations: 6, 7, 12, 13, 14
revenues:  5, 6, 5, 3, 1
distance:  20
separation: 4

Opt Revenue: 11
Opt Placements: 7,12


Test Case 3
-------------------
locations:  6, 7, 10, 12, 13, 14, 17, 19, 22, 23, 26, 28, 29, 30
revenues:   4, 11, 8, 5, 3, 5, 9, 5, 4, 5, 3, 3, 4, 7
distance:   30 
separation: 4

Opt Revenue: 37
Opt Placements: 7,12,17,23,30


Test Case 4
-------------------
locations:  1, 3, 6, 7, 10, 12, 13, 14, 17, 19, 22, 23, 26, 28, 29, 30
revenues:   3, 6, 4, 11, 8, 5, 3, 5, 9, 5, 4, 5, 3, 3, 4, 7
distance:   30
separation: 5

Opt Revenue: 35
Opt Placements: 3,10,17,23,30
